programme.title: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O diretor PC começa a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle está cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A mãe de Kyle faz um transplante fecal e os meninos recebem a missão de pegar o melhor microbioma.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que os ataques do dia 11 de setembro fazem parte de uma conspiração, e se dispõe para trazer a verdade à luz. Enquanto isso, o senhor Mackey apenas quer saber quem foi o infeliz que defecou no mictório.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Kyle se tornam prisioneiros do Pentágono até contarem exatamente como chegaram à Terra da Imaginação. Cartman não desistirá da aposta e quer que Kyle chupe suas bolas, conforme o combinado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Quando estão na Terra da Imaginação, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exército de forças imaginárias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginárias não são reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginação.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: As meninas do quarto ano fizeram uma lista secreta que dá nota a todos os garotos, do mais bonito ao mais feio. Os garotos roubam a lista e os resultados não são o que eles esperavam.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Enquanto a cidade está ocupada apontando culpados pela crise econômica, Randy apresenta uma solução para as dificuldades financeiras. Com a ajuda de todos os moradores, a cidade passa a viver sem qualquer economia.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan se mobiliza para impedir que os japoneses matem todas as baleias e os golfinhos do mundo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: As últimas notícias sobre testes científicos realizados na escola de South Park revelam que alguns dos meninos estão viciados em sexo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle, Cartman Kenny e Stan se juntam com os cidadãos de South Park e lutam bravamente contra a dominação de Nova Jersey em uma onda que está afetando todo o país
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle está "intestinalmente" envolvido no desenvolvimento de um novo produto revolucionário que será lançado pela Apple chamado HumancentiPad.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Quando Explode a Vingança, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Juan Miranda é um camponês rude com coração de Robin Hood. Sean Mallory é um revolucionário irlandês que é especialista em dinamite e vive agora no México.

programme.title: Se Encontrar Sartana, Reze pela sua Morte, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: O lendário herói Sartana é chamado para investigar uma série de roubos e assassinatos, que levam a consequências surpreendentes.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: A Marca Rubra, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Choya, um pistoleiro de moral distorcida, é convencido por Leffingwell a se passar pelo filho do rancheiro Richard Lavery, que está desaparecido há vinte e cinco anos e, com isso, possa herdar a fortuna de sua família.

programme.title: Joe, o Pistoleiro Implacável, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: O bando do impiedoso Duncan massacra uma tribo de índios Navajo inclusive mulheres e crianças apenas para conseguir e depois vender escalpos.

programme.title: A Marca do Zorro, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Don Diego Vega é chamado de volta de seu treinamento com os oficiais de elite na Espanha para a Califórnia, onde encontra seu pai, o alcaide, deposto e o povo vivendo sob o jugo tirano dos espanhóis.

programme.title: O Parceiro do Diabo, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Clay Lomax é um assaltante de banco que foi traído e ferido por seu parceiro, e por isso foi condenado a oito anos de prisão.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: Django, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Um pistoleiro carregando um caixão, entra em uma cidade que tem duas facções em guerra, o KKK e uma gangue de bandidos mexicanos. Esse é Django e ele se envolve em uma luta contra os dois lados.

programme.title: Em rota de colisão, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um grupo de terroristas russos sequestra um avião americano e planeja derrubá-lo em uma usina nuclear perto de Washington D.C. Cabe à tripulação e aos passageiros do voo, a missão de impedi-los antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em águas abertas, mas o diretor da prisão local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Um homem sem passado, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: Noam é um morador de rua que sofre de amnésia e é constantemente assombrado por pesadelos de seu passado. Após presenciar a morte de seu único amigo, ele decide buscar por justiça, ainda que isso custe ter o seu misterioso passado revelado.

programme.title: Intermediário.com, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. O empresário Jack Harris tem uma linda família e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemáticas. Até que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: 100 Dias de Resistencia, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: Zilan, uma jovem, retorna à sua cidade natal em busca dos vestígios de seu irmão morto, assassinado pelo Estado Islâmico.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: Em rota de colisão, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um grupo de terroristas russos sequestra um avião americano e planeja derrubá-lo em uma usina nuclear perto de Washington D.C. Cabe à tripulação e aos passageiros do voo, a missão de impedi-los antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Zombies)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: Oração Diabólica, (2020, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: Quatro viajantes são perseguidos pela maligna irmã Monday, uma lendária freira que matou diversas pessoas quando viva.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: O Trevo Vermelho, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um duende malvado que foi aprisionado nas raízes de um velho carvalho é acidentalmente solto no Dia de São Patrício. Uma vez livre, ele realiza sua vingança sangrenta contra as pessoas que originalmente o aprisionaram.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: Deep Web - Desejos Ocultos, (2020, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: DEEP WEB Desejos Ocultos conta a história de um hacker que é chantageado por um policial e, é obrigado a utilizar seus conhecimentos para viabilizar e vender lances de garotas sendo torturadas on line na quarta camada da DEEP WEB.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um tubarão gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: O Dia Da Múmia, (2014, Monsters)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack Wells explora a tumba do rei Neferu na esperança de recuperar um diamante lendário quando a múmia do rei retornar dos mortos em busca de vítimas humanas.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Zombies)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: Oração Diabólica, (2020, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: Quatro viajantes são perseguidos pela maligna irmã Monday, uma lendária freira que matou diversas pessoas quando viva.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de criminosos é contratado para recuperar uma fita de vídeo. À medida que eles buscam em pilhas de fitas VHS o vídeo certo, eles se deparam com um número aparentemente interminável de vídeos assustadores, cada um mais estranho que o último.

programme.title: Sango volta para a vila dos exterminadores para consertar seu Osso Voador. Indo para o poço, Agome encontra uma Nimenka, uma fruta que parece um rosto.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Tudo o que Aconteceu na Noite de Togenkyo: Parte 1

programme.title: Tokajin sequestra Agome. Inuyasha escapa do jardim em miniatura com a ajuda de Mirok e os outros e vai salvar Agome. Enquanto escapa, ele encontra uma flor com o rosto de um velho sábio.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Tudo o que Aconteceu na Noite de Togenkyo: Parte 2

programme.title: Sango retorna para a sua vila e conserta o Osso Voador. Ela também coloca o pai e as cinzas de seus companheiros para descansar. Quando ela está prestes a sair, ela é atacada.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Narak chama uma sacerdotisa chamada Tsubaki. Há cinquenta anos ela foi derrotada por Kikyo quando foi atrás da Jóia. Ela é uma sacerdotisa sombria que vendeu sua alma a um youkai para manter sua juventude e agora está atrás do sangue de Agome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Sacerdotisa das Sombras; Uma Maldição de 50 Anos

programme.title: Agome luta contra a maldição colocada por Tsubaki, uma sacerdotisa sombria. Enquanto isso, Kikyo aparece diante de Tsubaki.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyou Aparece! O Uso do Shikigami

programme.title: A maldição de Tsubaki rouba a consciência de Agome. Agome esquece o Japão feudal em um mundo ilusório.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Tsubaki visita a mansão onmyoji onde ela já treinou e planeja abrir uma porta proibida com o poder da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Sacerdotisa Azul e a Sacerdotisa Vermelha que Bloqueiam o Caminho

programme.title: Tsubaki é uma sacerdotisa que foi considerada a par com Kikyo. Ela estava com raiva porque a Jóia não lhe foi confiada, então se tornou uma sacerdotisa sombria.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Karon, O Demônio Gigante da Torre

programme.title: Uma noite, alguém possui Sango para atacar Mirok. O grupo examina um youkai que eles suspeitam estar por trás disso, mas estão enganados. Mirok é possuído em seguida e ataca Sango. Shippo tenta fugir, mas é encurralado por uma pequena sombra.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma fenda na barreira de Narak. Mas é o começo do mês, e quando a noite cai, Inuyasha perde seus poderes, e a busca por Narak é adiada.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Barreira de Narak; A Decisão de Kagura

programme.title: Kagura se aproxima de Sesshomaru e diz a ele para matar Narak, mas Sesshoumaru se recusa. Enquanto Inuyasha e os outros procuram por Kagura, eles percebem que Narak é um meio-youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Shippo recebe uma carta desafiando-o para uma batalha. O remetente da carta é Soten Raijyu, e ele ainda é apenas uma criança. Ele investigou Inuyasha e os outros e determinou que eles eram muito fortes, então ele focou sua atenção em Shippo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Um youkai nascido de um pedaço de carne que Narak descartou se transforma em um homem sem rosto e rouba o rosto bonito de Muso, um monge viajante.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Muso ataca Agome e Inuyasha o destrói com sua Ferida do Vento. Narak, que estava assistindo ao evento, diz a Kagura para contar a Inuyasha onde Muso foi.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Muso se regenera e Miroku diz a Inuyasha que o coração do youkai fica na cicatriz em forma de aranha. Kagura interfere e os insetos tiram o fragmento de Muso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Batalha de Três até a Morte

programme.title: Inuyasha visita Totosai em busca de uma técnica que pode romper a barreira de Narak. Lá ele conhece Bunza. Os dois fazem como Totosai os ordena. Bunza age como se fosse o discípulo mais velho, mas acaba entrando em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Miuga entrega uma mensagem para Totosai. Ele diz que a Tessaiga ficará mais forte se cortar derrotar um poderoso youkai. O grupo procura então os youkais morcegos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mãe e os Sentimentos de Shiori

programme.title: O youkai morcego tenta destruir a aldeia junto com a mãe de Shiori. Inuyasha é bloqueado pela barreira da menina e não consegue derrotá-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Tessaiga Vermelha que Quebra a Barreira

programme.title: A tribo youkais Gatos do Fogo ataca do oeste. Seu objetivo é obter os fragmentos da Jóia de Agome, bem como se vingar de Sesshomaru e Inuyasha, filhos do grande cão youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Conspiração dos Quatro Youkais Gatos de Fogo

programme.title: Inuyasha corta a barreira e junto com o Kuga, eles entram no castelo. Enquanto isso, Mirok e Sango caíram sob um feitiço, e Agome está presa em uma prisão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Alvos são Sesshomaru e Inuyasha

programme.title: O Rei Pantera, o general da tribo Pantera, começa a se mover com o poder da Jóia. Inuyasha e Sesshomaru atacam a múmia. Enquanto isso, Kuga, Mirok e os outros levam Agome e os outros para um local seguro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Gatos de Fogo e a Espada de Dois Caninos

programme.title: Sango é convidada a matar um youkai por um jovem senhor chamado Kuranosuke, que se apaixonou por ela seis anos atrás. Kuranosuke tem aparência, status e riqueza. Sango está confusa sobre como ela recusará sua proposta de casamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A Tessaiga está equipada com uma técnica que pode romper barreiras. Jaken planeja roubá-la de Inuyasha, mas seus planos fracassam continuamente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Plano de Jaken para Roubar Tessaiga

programme.title: Narak diz a Sesshomaru que ele devolverá Rin se ele matar Inuyasha, mas Sesshomaru se recusa e vai até o castelo dele. Enquanto isso, Agome detecta a presença da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sesshomaru e o Sequestro de Rin

programme.title: Narak está tentando absorver Sesshomaru para que ele possa obter os poderes de um youkai completo. Mas Inuyasha rompe sua barreira e interfere. Quando Narak vê que o jogo foi virado, ele foge.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome retorna aos dias atuais. Ela está ocupada se preparando para um simulado de dois dias. Enquanto isso, Sango está preocupada com Kohaku, que foi levado por Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Conexão Entre o Presente e a Época das Guerras

programme.title: Ayame, uma youkai loba, aparece diante de Kuga e diz a ele que é sua noiva. Mas Kuga é loucamente apaixonado por Agome. Em sua fuga, Kuga encontra o castelo de Narak. Ayame vai atrás dele e é atacada por um youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Youkai Loba e a Grande Promessa

programme.title: Ayame leva Kuga para parar a luta de seus companheiros. Mas ela não tem intenção de retornar para ele. O youkai que estava atrás dos fragmentos da Jóia ataca. Kuga luta para proteger Agome e Ayame.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Proposta de Casamento Super Veloz

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo conhecem uma senhora que é uma falsa exorcista. A fim de descobrir por que tantos youkais apareceram recentemente, eles vão ao Castelo que parece ser a origem desse problema.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Aumento da Energia Maligna; A Cabeça do Demônio

programme.title: Inuyasha luta contra o senhor do Castelo. Sango ouve que Mirok foi para o porão com a princesa e vai atrás dele. Agome encontra o cadáver da verdadeira princesa no quarto do lorde.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Enquanto procura por Narak, Kikyo conhece Kansuke, um velho bandido que está gravemente doente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo aceitam um trabalho para se livrar dos macacos, que estão destruindo campos. Eles encontram três macacos, Gon, Bun e Ken.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Três Youkais do Deus Macaco

programme.title: Agome pega um resfriado e retorna aos dias atuais. Inuyasha está preocupado com ela. Ele reúne muitos alimentos nutritivos derrotando vários youkais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Confronto Entre Inuyasha e Hojo

programme.title: Para impedir que Secco chegue ao Coliseu antes, Bucciarati o atrai para um duelo sob as ruas de Roma.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ferido demais para perceber quem o está ajudando, Bucciarati é levado ao Coliseu por Doppio, que revela sua verdadeira identidade à pessoa que o está esperando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Emperor Crimson é disparado contra Polnareff, o Silver Chariot é perfurado pela flecha. Quem está dentro do Coliseu adormece de forma misteriosa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Com as almas trocadas entre si, Mista e os outros têm que dar um jeito de recuperar a flecha antes que Diavolo fique com ela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Requiem provoca mutação nas entidades ao seu redor, Giorno conclui que a alma de Diavolo deve estar possuindo um dos membros de sua equipe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Apesar de seus esforços, a flecha cai nas mãos de Diavolo. Mas antes que o chefe possa perfurar seu próprio Stand com ela, Bucciarati intervém.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand de Giorno evolui para Golden Wind Requiem. Diavolo tenta anular seus ataques, mas uma nova e terrível realidade aguarda o chefe da máfia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ao investigar o suposto suicídio da filha do florista, Mista se depara com um usuário de Stand chamado Scolippi.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Após a morte de seu pai, Dio Brando entra para uma família aristocrática e jura para si mesmo que vai deixar o herdeiro deles, Jonathan “JoJo” Joestar, sem nada.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo conhece um líder de gangue chamado Speedwagon quando vai a Londres investigar o envenenamento de seu pai.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo enfrenta Dio após dar o antídoto ao pai. Durante a batalha, Dio decide usar a máscara de pedra.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo reencontra seu primeiro amor, Erina. Um homem chamado Will A. Zeppeli demonstra ter um estranho poder e diz que JoJo precisa destruir a máscara de pedra.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo e seus companheiros são emboscados por Dio e uma horda de zumbis depois de serem atraídos até um cemitério por um garoto chamado Poco.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O lendário cavaleiro Blueford ressuscita e confia sua espada a JoJo. Tarkus ataca JoJo com força avassaladora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Zeppeli ataca Tarkus, mesmo sabendo de seu destino terrível. Em um último ato de coragem, ele usa as forças que lhe restam para repassar seus poderes ao sucessor, JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo resgata a irmã de Poco. Dire, um amigo de Zeppeli, bate de frente com Dio. Com a espada de Blueford nas mãos, JoJo volta a enfrentar Dio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo e Erina embarcam em um cruzeiro para a lua de mel. Mas, para o espanto de JoJo, uma pessoa ligada a Dio aparece a bordo do navio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano é 1938. Em uma ruína mexicana, diversas máscaras de pedra são descobertas. Na cidade de Nova York, um jovem chamado Smokey recebe a ajuda de Joseph, o neto de JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph enfrenta Straizo, que virou vampiro após trair seu amigo Speedwagon. Terminada a batalha, Straizo avisa sobre o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph é atacado por um dos homens de Stroheim na chegada ao México. Stroheim tenta despertar Santviento, o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa seu poder para tentar fugir de Santviento. Quando isso não dá certo, ele tenta expor seu inimigo à luz do sol para se salvar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Speedwagon conhecem Caesar, neto de Zeppeli, quando chegam a Roma após a descoberta de que existem outros Homens do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Homem do Pilar Wamuu fere Caesar Zeppeli durante uma luta feroz. Joseph revela a nova técnica que desenvolveu em segredo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Caesar leva Joseph até Veneza para conhecer sua mentora Lisa Lisa, que começa a treiná-lo com rigor para aprender a controlar seus poderes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Lisa Lisa diz a Joseph que ele precisa da pedra chamada Super Aja para destruir os Homens do Pilar. Joseph e Caesar enfrentam outros mestres.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Caesar combinam seus poderes e enfrentam o Homem do Pilar que tomou o corpo de Suzi Q para roubar a Pedra Vermelha de Aja.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Stroheim luta com Kars em seu novo corpo mecânico. Joseph e Kars caem de um precipício na tentativa de conseguir a Pedra Vermelha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: Depp stars in the title role as a man unjustly sent to prison who vows revenge, not only for his punishment, but for the devastating consequences that happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: The Night Listener, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a radio show host develops a telephone relationship with a young listener and his adoptive mother, questions arise about the boy's identity. The host sets off on a harrowing journey to discover the truth in this riveting psychological thriller.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Pierce, a paramedic, is on the brink of madness from too many years of saving and losing lives. One fateful night, Frank meets Mary Burke, the daughter of a man Frank tried to save. Together, Frank and Mary confront the ghosts of the past.

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder and Academy Award(r)-winner Angelina Jolie are the certifiable stars of Claymoore Hospital's South Bell ward in this wry adaptation of Susanna Kaysen's best-selling memoir.

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story about a single father and his young son. Finding themselves homeless, he risks everything on an unpaid internship in a highly competitive stockbroker training program, where only one in twenty interns make the grade.

programme.title: Same Kind of Different as Me, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: From The NY Times bestseller comes an inspirational true story about two men from drastically different backgrounds, who develop a surprising bond that will lead them on the most remarkable journey of their lives and forge an everlasting friendship.

programme.title: Hart's War, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: War hero Col. McNamara is imprisoned in a German POW camp. As the camp's highest-ranking American officer, he commands his fellow inmates. Never giving up the fight to win the war, McNamara is planning, waiting for his moment to strike back at the enemy.

programme.title: Woman Thou Art Loosed, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Woman Thou Art Loosed follows the life of Michelle Jordan (Kimberly Elise) who is raised in a home of dysfunction and abuse. The years of mistreatment from her mother's (Loretta Devine) boyfriend results in Michelle's entanglement in the world of drugs

programme.title: Trumbo, (2007, Documentary)
programme.desc: Trumbo documents the rise of Dalton Trumbo's career in Hollywood, and his subsequent public humiliation from being among the "Hollywood Ten" blacklisted by the House Un-American Activities Committee in the 1940s for communist associations.

programme.title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople, (2016, Drama)

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon, (1970, Musical)

programme.title: The Hunting Party, (1971, Action)

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Drama)

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Western)

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Western)

programme.title: Johnny Guitar, (1954, Western)

programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: The Conversation, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Coppola's provoking mystery-drama in which Harry Caul, expert surveillance man, hears something disturbing in his recording of a young couple in a park. He worries about what the tape may be used for and becomes involved in a maze of secrecy and murder.

programme.title: Boxcar Bertha, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: Set in the Depression era of the 1930s, a young woman and three men rob trains and plan a kidnapping. The men are caught and the woman becomes a prostitute. Based on "Sister of the Road" by Boxcar Bertha Thomson as told to Ben L. Reitman.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has joined the enemy! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies to whittle Joey's forces into waste! Is this the last we'll see of him, or will a legendary guardian recognize Joey as a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world's conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his guardian monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi calls on the legendary strength of Timaeus, but when it's not enough to crack Rafael's defense, will Yugi resort to desperate measures and go against everything he believes in to make the riskiest move of his life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi's soul! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz's new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Nothing will stop Weevil and Rex Raptor from quenching their thirst for revenge by capturing Yugi and Joey's souls!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Weevil's insect invasion. Discouraged and confused, Yugi has lost his dueling instincts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is on a vision quest where he must travel through a past of evil to find and conquer his greatest foe... himself.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn't care! Dartz sends out his ancient annihilator Orichalcos Soldier to finish Yugi once and for all.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions
programme.desc: The stakes have never been higher, the rivalries never as fierce, the risks never so great. One wrong move - one card short - and it's game over for good.

programme.title: Brook officially signs on as the newest member of the Straw Hats, and Luffy learns that his brother Ace may be in some serious trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A NEW CREWMATE! THE MUSICIAN, HUMMING BROOK

programme.title: The Straw Hats encounter two young girls who are looking for their father, and Luffy has another run in with the devious Captain Foxy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SLOW-SLOW MENACE / "SILVER FOX" FOXY RETURNS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats attempt to destroy a floating resort in order to reunite two sisters who possess a blueprint for making jewels!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GREAT SCRAMBLE FOR TREASURE / COLLAPSE! SPA ISLAND

programme.title: Brook struggles to adjust to life among living after so many years alone in the darkness. Can the Straw Hats survive his chaotic attempts to fit in?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S GREAT STRUGGLE / IS THE PATH TO BECOMING A TRUE COMRADE RIGOROUS?

programme.title: After surviving a terrible storm to reach the entrance to the Red Line, Luffy slugs a mysterious sea monster and Sanji may finally get to meet a mermaid!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HALFWAY ACROSS THE GRAND LINE / ARRIVAL AT THE RED LINE!

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats agree to help a mermaid rescue her friend, but the mission gets dangerous when a gang of flying fish dive bomb their boat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HE HATES THE STRAW HAT CREW / IRON MASKED DUVAL MAKES HIS APPEARANCE

programme.title: The Straw Hats agree to join Camie's rescue mission, but her captured friend turns out to be a dangerous enemy from the past!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FATED REUNION! SAVE THE CAPTIVE FISHMAN

programme.title: The Straw Hats wage a death-defying battle with a group of flying fish, and Luffy is shocked by the familiar face of their latest enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TRAGEDY! THE TRUTH HIDDEN UNDER DUVAL'S MASK

programme.title: Sanji squares off against his lookalike, Camie shows off just how fast a mermaid can swim, and Luffy defeats a giant bull without even landing a blow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXPLOSION! SUNNY'S SUPER-SECRET WEAPON, GAON CANNON

programme.title: After their showdown with Duval, Luffy and the Straw Hats enjoy a hearty meal before proceeding to the site of their next adventure – an island bursting with bubbles!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DISEMBARKING WITH SIGHTS SET ON FISH-MAN ISLAND / THE SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stop at an island overflowing with bubbles to get their ship modified for underwater travel, but it's not long before they stumble upon an outrageous explosion and attract unwanted attention.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TYRANNY! THE RULERS OF SABAODY, THE CELESTIAL DRAGONS

programme.title: Shakky explains why Sabaody Archipelago seems to be crawling with bounty hunters – eleven of the Grand Line's most wanted pirates are currently ashore and two of them are in Luffy's crew!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A mysterious stranger keeps Zoro from tangling with a powerful Celestial Dragon, and Chopper goes bonkers when Camie disappears from the amusement park.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE TARGET IS CAMIE!! THE LOOMING CLUTCHES OF A PROFESSIONAL KIDNAPPER

programme.title: Camie was abducted by a dastardly gang of kidnappers, and her next stop is the auction house unless the Straw Hats can rescue her. To make it in time, they'll have to hitch a ride on some flying fish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: RESCUE CAMIE / THE ARCHIPELAGO'S LINGERING DARK HISTORY

programme.title: With a little help from their fishy mates, the Straw Hats make it to the auction house in time to save Camie, but explosive elements prevent them from taking her back by force. Luckily, Nami's concocted a very generous plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TIME LIMIT / THE HUMAN AUCTION BEGINS

programme.title: Nami's plan to save Camie goes belly up when a snot-nosed Celestial Dragon outbids the Straw Hats. Luffy and Zoro make an explosive arrival at the auction house and promptly open up a deadly can of worms.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIST EXPLODES! DESTROY THE AUCTION

programme.title: Luffy turns a mermaid auction into a pirate-style brawl when he knocks the snot out of a Celestial Dragon. With a fleet of marines out to get them, the Straw Hats will have to fight their way off the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MAJOR PANIC! DESPERATE STRUGGLE AT THE AUCTION HOUSE

programme.title: They saved Camie from the auction block, but now the Straw Hats are surrounded by a fleet of marines. Lucky for Luffy, Eustass "Captain" Kidd and Trafalgar Law are ready to join the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU TAKES ACTION! SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO THROWN INTO CHAOS

programme.title: The Straw Hats join forces with Kidd's crew and Trafalgar's mates to make short work of the marines, but they're in for a surprise when they encounter a Warlord of the Sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE SIEGE! THE NAVY VS. THE THREE CAPTAINS

programme.title: Luffy and his crew duck the marines by hiding out at Rayleigh's house. While Chopper tends to Hachi, Rayleigh entertains the Straw Hats with tales of his days as first mate on Gold Roger's ship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ROGER AND RAYLEIGH - THE KING OF THE PIRATES AND HIS RIGHT HAND MAN

programme.title: Admiral Kizaru has arrived to lead the marines on a mission to wipe out all pirates. Meanwhile, Luffy and his crew prepare for a deadly battle with one of the Warlords of the Sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NO ESCAPE!? ADMIRAL KIZARU'S LIGHT SPEED KICK!!

programme.title: A groovy pirate belts out a tune that leaves Kizaru in pieces, but the admiral pulls himself together in time for a crushing Light Speed Kick. Luffy and Sanji try to protect the injured Zoro from a Warlord lookalike.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OVERWHELMING! THE NAVY'S FIGHTING WEAPONS, THE PACIFISTAS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats narrowly defeat a robot that resembles one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. But before the dust settles on the field of battle, a far deadlier foe comes looking for a fight.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN EVEN STRONGER ENEMY APPEARS! THE BATTLE AXE-CARRYING SENTOMARU

programme.title: Zoro's barely breathing, and Admiral Kizaru is ready to stomp him into oblivion. The battered and beaten Straw Hats could certainly use a powerful friend right about now.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU'S FIERCE ASSAULT / THE STRAW HATS FACE CERTAIN DEATH!

programme.title: One by one, the mighty paw-print of Bartholomew Kuma makes the Straw Hats disappear until only Luffy remains. To where did his mates vanish? And will he ever see them again?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ELIMINATED FRIENDS - THE FINAL DAY OF THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Yesterday, the Straw Hats valiantly battled a Warlord of the Sea. Today, Boss Luffy and his friends at the Pinwheel Diner prepare to compete in the Great Portable Shrine Race!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / BOSS LUFFY APPEARS AGAIN

programme.title: Thriller Company sabotages the race for a sacred treasure, and the displaced Straw Hats must pull an all-nighter to rebuild their shrine and score some ancient gold!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / DEFEAT THRILLER COMPANY'S TRAP!

programme.title: Luffy finds himself stranded and starving on a strange island. The rubber-man's amazing appetite puts his manhood in danger when he devours an array of exotic mushrooms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING! THE ALL-FEMALE ISLAND, AMAZON LILY

programme.title: An army of scantily-clad women warriors want to investigate Luffy's family jewels, but the captain of the Straw Hats is more interested in reuniting with his lost mates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HURRY BACK TO YOUR FRIENDS! THE MAIDEN ISLAND ADVENTURE

programme.title: The women chasing Luffy are loyal subjects of Boa Hancock, the curvaceous Warlord of the Sea. This stone-cold beauty is deadly, and she's about to pick a fight with an entire fleet of marines!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVERYONE FALLS IN LOVE! PIRATE EMPRESS HANCOCK

programme.title: Luffy's search for a seaworthy vessel leads to a "drop-in" on the Snake Princess during the royal bathing hour. The view is world-class, but it might turn the rubber-man to stone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET HIDDEN ON THE BACKS / LUFFY AND THE SNAKE PRINCESS MEET

programme.title: Boa Hancock makes Luffy mad when she turns Margaret into a statue. The Snake Princess may have bitten off more than she can chew by challenging the captain of the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HEARTLESS JUDGMENT! MARGARET IS TURNED TO STONE!!

programme.title: The Snake Princess pits Luffy's Gum-Gum abilities against the incredible Haki power of her serpentine sisters in a fight to the death. Will Luffy survive long enough to save his statuesque friends?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DIFFICULT FIGHT FOR LUFFY! THE SNAKE SISTERS' HAKI POWER!!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang head to the isolated country of Kimasan, after hearing the country possesses mountains of treasure. They sneak across the border but are quickly captured by Kinkaku and Ginkaku, the giants who rule the country.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's Great Journey to the West

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Casino Paradise is an artificial island owned and operated by Domino, a casino tycoon. Domino decides to run for President and brags that with $500 million to spend, the only way he can lose is if Lupin steals his campaign funds!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Political fixer Pomade Jaws trusts no one, not even his wife Laura. He's stored the scandalous secrets of various world leaders inside a voice-activated safe.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Pops Fell in Love With

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen and Goemon have turned themselves in to the FBI, but it's all part of the plan. Their real goal is to break out old man Clyde Barlow, who was once known as a genius bank robber, to get his help with their heist of the National Super Bank.
programme.sub-title: A Classical Thief and a Myna

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Isamu Kondo III, grandson of the leader of the Shinsengumi, hires Lupin and his gang to recover a golden cannon sunk by the Shogunate forces in the Tsugaru Strait. After much effort, the valuable golden cannon is finally recovered from the deep ocean.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Ellery Queen, the owner of the legendary sapphire called "The Eye of Solomon," is also the owner of a football team. Lupin, coming for the sapphire as announced, discovers Queen on the brink of death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The 3rd Thieves Olympic is about to be held in Japan, and Lupin and Jigen are in it to win it! After winning the first and second Thieves Olympic, if they also win this year's getaway race, they'll become the first-ever Triple-Crown winners!
programme.sub-title: Through the Flowers or Storms, The Thieves Race

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The world's largest diamond has been discovered in South Africa and Lupin has his eyes on the prize. But as it turns out, stealing it is the easy part!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko decides to marry Huffner for his jewelry collection, disregarding the rumor that Huffner's brides always die a mysterious death within a few weeks of their wedding. Turns out, he's also a collector of brides and likes them permanently preserved!
programme.sub-title: A Wedding Dress Doesn't Suit Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen receives a letter from Sister Angelica and heads to the African country of Borodias. Sister Angelica wants Jigen's help to rescue Dr. Othello, the leader of the country's independence movement.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO tries a different approach to capturing Lupin: Astrology. It enlists the help of Marianne, a clairvoyant who can read Lupin's actions using astrological predictions and her crystal ball.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko calls Lupin from Professor Pot's lab, but since Lupin is half-asleep, Jigen takes the call instead. Fujiko claims Professor Pot has accidentally invented a robot that manufactures diamonds, but Jigen doesn't believe a word she says and hangs up.
programme.sub-title: Diamon's Shining in the Robot's Eye

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko has invited Lupin and company to a classical concert conducted by Kyoransky from the International Philharmonic. After they get a good look at Kyoransky's baton, studded with a a diamond worth at least 200 million yen.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes to prison intent on making Silver tell what he did with the loot, only to discover that a new top-of-the-line prison was built over the site where he hid the money. Will the operation to trade an execution for the recovery of the money succeed?
programme.sub-title: The Last Gift in Prison is Cup Ramen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the Golden Bell, symbol of the monarchy of Beltenberg and precious tourist attraction. However, the bell that sparkles in the belfry is just a brass replica.
programme.sub-title: Fujiko, Men are A Sorry Lot!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata is taken hostage from ICPO headquarters. The terrorists demand to swap him with their boss Napoleon XI, but ICPO refuses. Since Zenigata is no further use to them, the terrorists are bound to kill him; but Lupin is to the rescue?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Smith Gang hit-man company was once the best in the business, but they're suffering now from tough competition. Though the company chairman Smith considers running TV ads to revive his business, he can't think of a good way to do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joe Spade was once a formidable hitman of renown and Jigen's sharpshooter coach, he now comes to beg for Jigen's help; he had gotten old, flubbed a hit contract, and is now on the run.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: ICPO Bureau Chief Jasmine is an able commissioner. She uses the governor to spur Zenigata into action, as she has a secret plan to arrest Lupin. But Jasmine's plan is to make this mission her very last at ICPO so she could get married.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Nightlight Mask murdered the Duke of Le Mond and stole his diamonds. ICPO is having trouble solving the case, so they induct mystery author Conan Dorill as a special inspector. Dorill deduces that the true identity of Nightlight Mask is Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a night of thunder and rain, a man gives Lupin a doll. The next day there is a news report that a diamond called the Phoenix's Tear had been stolen. Lupin's been caught on security cameras, but he has no recollection of having done the deed.
programme.sub-title: When the Devil Calls to Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's target is the Vatican Crown, located at the North Pole. He devises a plan to thwart pesky Fujiko, which is to relocate penguins at the South Pole to the North Pole.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's North Pole, South Pole Adventures

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsène Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Cloverfield, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Five young New Yorkers face a life or death struggle in order to escape from the city when a monster the size of a skyscraper suddenly appears.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A trio of American astronauts become instant heroes as they plant the Stars and Stripes on Mars before beginning the voyage home. But back on their ship, something else has set its sights on Earth, something whose relatives have already paid us a visit.

programme.title: Species III, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the ongoing fight for supremacy between mankind and the human-alien hybrids, a fatal hybrid weakness has given humans the advantage. Until now.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Lifeforce, (1985, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A frightening journey into the unknown awaits an Earthbound scout ship when it comes across an alien spacecraft of enormous proportions. Further investigation reveals a roomful of glass coffins containing the bodies of frozen creatures.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: From Noon Till Three, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson plays Graham Dorsey, a bank robber who, through a series of twists and turns finds himself the object of national adoration. A beautiful widow, Amanda Starbuck (Jill Ireland) is responsible for creating this myth.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Drama)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: The Dark Command, (1940, Drama)
programme.desc: A Civil War tale based on the exploits of the notorious outlaw William Quantrill. A courageous sheriff stands up to Quantrill and his band of guerrillas pillaging the countryside in Civil War-torn Kansas, and stops the raids.

programme.title: The Tin Star, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Ben Owens, a greenhorn sheriff who hasn’t worn his badge long... and won’t live to wear it much longer unless he gets some savvy help.

programme.title: Valdez Is Coming, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: In this rousing Western, when a greedy rancher causes the death of an innocent man, former sheriff Bob Valdez (Burt Lancaster) orders him to provide financial support for the widow. But when he refuses, Valdez vows to exact justice at any cost!

programme.title: Saginaw Trail, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry is sent to investigate the murders of settlers with the help of Smiley Burnette and two young homesteaders. Gene soon discovers that rich fur trader is behind the staged Indian raids.

programme.title: Winning Of The West, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry protects a publisher and printer from some crooks who are using Indian raids to cover their bandit activities. When Gene's brother kills the publisher, Gene’s integrity is in question.

programme.title: Saga of Death Valley, (1939, Drama)
programme.desc: Roy comes back to Death Valley to take over the ranch some years after his father had been murdered by the local bigwig who is extorting the ranchers by threatening to cut off their water supply.

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos, (1941, Drama)
programme.desc: It took some time after the Civil War for the South to recover. Towns imposed martial law to maintain order and the "good guys" banded together against the criminals.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman (2014), (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Drama)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the army…and each other!

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: Julia Roberts stars as a novice art history professor with a surprising lesson plan that inspires her students to open their eyes to love and life.

programme.title: Identity, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: What if every choice we ever make was already made for us? What if there really were no coincidences in life and our destinies were already predetermined? Ten strangers with secrets are brought together in a savage rainstorm. Rated: R

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: Memento, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

programme.title: Bug, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: A paranoid, unhinged war veteran who sees insects everywhere holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room.

programme.title: The Perfect Guy, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman meets an IT expert who seems to be the perfect guy. But after a sex charged courtship, she sees a violent side of him and dissolves the relationship. In jealous rage and fueled by insane revenge, he violates her privacy.

programme.title: Horsemen, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: A recently widowed detective still grieving over his wife's death discovers a shocking connection between himself and the suspects in a serial killing spree linked to the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.

programme.title: Suspect Zero, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: An FBI agent, investigating the case of a murdered serial killer, finds himself on the trail of an avenging former agent who has dedicated himself to hunting down serial killers.

programme.title: Paycheck, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Michael Jennings works on top-secret projects. After each job, his memory is erased. After his latest assignment, he is shocked to be told that he agreed to forfeit all payment, until he receives an envelope containing clues to his forgotten past.
